title: Twister
creator_credit: Twister Productions, Constant c Productions, Universal Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Kathleen Kennedy, Jan de Bont, Joseph C. Nemec III, Ellen Mirojnick, Michael Crichton, Ian Bryce, Anne-Marie Martin and Ken Nielsen
brief_description: TV weatherman Bill Harding is trying to get his tornado-hunter wife, Jo, to sign divorce papers so he can marry his girlfriend Melissa. But Mother Nature, in the form of a series of intense storms sweeping across Oklahoma, has other plans.

constellations_other.name: Representing disasters
constellations_other.description: The devastating Indian Ocean tsunami was captured by many people on personal devices and home cameras, with the footage broadcast to the world. The event also inspired feature films that are part of a long tradition of disaster films, which often push the boundaries of VFX.

creator_credit_for_label: Twister Productions, Constant c Productions, Universal Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Kathleen Kennedy, Jan de Bont, Joseph C. Nemec III, Ellen Mirojnick, Michael Crichton, Ian Bryce, Anne-Marie Martin and Ken Nielsen
description: An unprecedented series of violent tornadoes is sweeping across Oklahoma. Tornado chasers, headed by Dr. Jo Harding, attempt to release a groundbreaking device that will allow them to track them and create a more advanced warning system. They are joined by Jo’s soon to be ex-husband Bill, a former tornado chaser himself, and his girlfriend Melissa.
description_for_label: An unprecedented series of violent tornadoes is sweeping across Oklahoma.
